AttributeName.markdownDescription:
Name of the dataset field

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*  
Update requires: No interruption

AttributeType.markdownDescription:
Data type of the field

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: string | integer | float | timestamp | geolocation  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Attributes.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyArn.description: KMS key used to encrypt the Dataset data
KmsKeyArn.markdownDescription:
KMS key used to encrypt the Dataset data

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:aws[-a-z]*:kms:.*:key/.*  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Forecast can assume to access the AWS KMS key.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Forecast can assume to access the AWS KMS key.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\-\_\.\/\:]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

DatasetName.markdownDescription:
A name for the dataset

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*  
Update requires: Replacement

DatasetType.markdownDescription:
The dataset type

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: TARGET_TIME_SERIES | RELATED_TIME_SERIES | ITEM_METADATA  
Update requires: No interruption

DataFrequency.description: Frequency of data collection. This parameter is required for RELATED_TIME_SERIES
DataFrequency.markdownDescription:
Frequency of data collection. This parameter is required for RELATED_TIME_SERIES

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^Y|M|W|D|H|30min|15min|10min|5min|1min$  
Update requires: No interruption

Domain.description: The domain associated with the dataset
Domain.markdownDescription:
The domain associated with the dataset

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: RETAIL | CUSTOM | INVENTORY_PLANNING | EC2_CAPACITY | WORK_FORCE | WEB_TRAFFIC | METRICS  
Update requires: No interruption
